list.description:
So I watched Frieren: Beyond Journey's End with my friends, and I enjoyed it.

Anyway, here's the funny elf mage to help you aim your 70 mm at your enemies.

#alltanks #anime #frieren #sousou_no_frieren #beyond_journeys_end #elf

Leopard 1A5 EMES-18 SIGHT!! (for all leopard 1a5, including leo 1a5no, a1a1 l/44 and c2a1 mexas, but for only 1080p!)HISTORICAL semihistorical

Hello guys, i hope all are enjoying a very jolly christmas this year
today i have this leopard 1 sight all for you and maybe i will put this under your tree ^^
i applied the same method as my other sight but adding the upper range finder but i really dont like how the result looks bc of the empty spaces, but this is all we got with this current sight making offered by gaijin...

AMX-32 (105)

Fictional FCS sight for AMX-32 (105). Green is default, red is illuminated. The file is documented, you can change the colors if you'd like.

#france #amx #sight #fictional #tank

Fictional FCS sight for AMX-30 Super. Green is default, red is illuminated. The file is documented, you can change the colors if you'd like.

Realistic VT-4A1 gunner sight
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A1-FHMnK-vA

#china #sight #historical #realistic #vt4 #vt4_a1

!!!Obsolete!!!

Gamingwithclassified sight if u watch him u know the sight

this is for the viewers or whoever stumbles upon it

if u dont like this one there i have a cleaner one available

!!!Obsolete/Broken!!!

fixed where file didnt show up Just Redownload

a New version of my sight i tweaked some stuff made it cleaner

i would recommend making the thermal and crosshair lighting the same button to get the green lines when switching to thermal other wise it stays red

i would also reccomend not using this at lowtier or without a laser rangefinder

cool effect is the 0000 turn to your range but if u reset your range too fast it will overlap (cant fix that)

AMX-40 and AMX-32 (120)

Fictional FCS sight for AMX-40 and AMX-32 (120). Green is default, red is illuminated. The file is documented, you can change the colors if you'd like.

MADE AS REQUESTED BY A USER LIKE YOU

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Fresh Re-do on my old Swedish sight for M/49B rockets and guns (plus 57mm for the T18B57). LEGACY SIGHT STILL INCLUDED IN PACK.

To aim the M/49B rockets Make sure IAS is greater than 360kmh for the main middle boxes. Use the upper sight when over 500kmh, and the lower when below 250kmh. Dive angle shoul...

#pgz04a
BF2 - CN - PGZ04A Sight
Zoom : 2.0x - 6.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_pgz_04a

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_pgz_04a

Realistic sight for Hungarian (IT) KF-41

12-18-2023 : UPDATE => minor adjustement on central reticle (more precise values of reticle's dimension)

2 versions availables:
black in normal and white in illuminated
white in normal and black in illuminated

.Zip folder contain:
-folder of it_kf_41
-file realistic_sight_kf41
-file realistic_sight_kf41white

Adapted for WT:
Dynamic informations (orientation, elevation, informations) are fixed in situation.
Sight color: Black (base) or White.

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Gunsight and Tiny Tim sight for the F8F-1 and F8F-1B (US and France).
TO AIM TINY TIMS Use the top boxes at 600m when IAS is above 500kmh. If below 500kmh, use the lower petals to aim. Use the lower boxes when IAS is greater than 550kmh at 1500m distance.

INSTALL by unzipping included UserSkins folder to War Thunder root directory and combine with any ex...

Blue archive universal sight.

Just drop it in to the sight folder of the tank you want to apply.

if there is no sight folder, just preview your tank , go to "option", then click "main parameters" → “ common battle setting” → “use alternative sight grid” → “add a grid sight”

#anime

M113 TOW, PvrBv-551 and Udes-33 sight

Meh, i was too bored so i made this simple and historical sight for all the M133 TOW, Pvrbv551 and Udes-33 Rbs-55 (TOW) launchers, even the new Giraf

#sight #me262 #me262a1u4 #germany #plane #collimator #50mm

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Sight for the Me-262 Narwhal set to 600m distance. Works well from 300-1200m range.

Install by unzipping included UserSkins folder to War Thunder game root directory and combine with any existing folder.

Modern Leopard 2 Series custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Compatible with all DM53 firing Leopard 2.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.


For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Check up my profile for other custom sights for different vehicles and nations.

#leopard #leopard2 #leopard2a5 #leopard2a5pso #leopard2a6 #leopard2a7 #leopard2a7v #germany #sweden #ger #swe #mbt #mainbattlet...

Leopard 2 Series custom sight made for my friend @F-2A
*Updated for Christian II on 23 March*

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Can be used on most Leopard 2 series MBT

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.


For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Check up my profile for other custom sights for different vehicles and nations.

#leopard2a4 #italy #it #leopard2pl #poland #pl #leopard #leopard...

SIMPLIFIED SAMSON 30MM SIGHT

The turret is found on the Lithuanian Vilkas IFV.
Sight is based off of footage found for the Samson 30mm turret.

17/12/23:

  • Text position for rangefinder and range fixed.

17/01/24:

  • Fixed size of scope after zoom changes.

*Updated for Christian II on 23 March*

!WARNING! This sight is compatible with any 2A4 currently in War Thunder.


For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Gun and rocket sight for the P-38 Lightning. Includes HVAR and M8 rockets. M8 rockets are easy to aim, just follow the speed guides.

To aim HVARs Dive between 20-30 degrees and use the speeds indicated. The boxes are set for 600m, and the outer sights are for 300m and the farthest is for 200m. ...

Modern Russian MBT custom sight
T-72B3, T-90M, T-80BVM

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

!WARNING! This sight is compatible with other tanks, but it will not fit the screen properly due to the different sight characteristics like FOV. This is only 100% compatible with the T-72B3, T-90M and T-72B3 from the USSR tech tree.


For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarf...

#sight #he219 #he219a7 #planes #collimator #userskin #germany

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Sight for the He-219 to allow for accurate use of its punchy armament. Main reticle is for the high velocity (HV) 30mm at 600m, mid reticle for the low velocity (LV) 30mm at 600m. Bottom reticle is ranged for each ammo and marked as such.

Install by unzipping the included UserSkins folder to your War Thunder game root and combine with any existing folder.

Lützow scope for all tanks.

Image: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/106042860

The archive contains:
Lutzow_VeryBig.blk (sight)
Lutzow_Big.blk (sight)
Lutzow_Small.blk (sight)
Lutzow.skp (source, for editing)

#lutzow #azur_lane #anime #all_tanks
